title: Manta's Layer-2 Blockchain Already Plans to Ditch OP Stack for Polygon
description: The network, which just went live a couple weeks ago as a so-called optimistic rollup – the core underpinning of OP Stack – will now become a “ZK-rollup,” which is what Polygon’s software kit provides.

title: The Ripple Effects of a Spot Market Bitcoin ETF
description: Financial giants including BlackRock and Fidelity are looking to launch a bitcoin investment vehicle for people who do or cannot hold bitcoin directly.

title: What’s Next for Grayscale, Spot Bitcoin ETF After SEC Declines to Appeal Court Decision?
description: One analyst believes SEC Chair Gary Gensler has little choice but to soon approve the long-awaited vehicle.

title: Binance Crypto Exchange Will Stop Onboarding UK Customers
description: Regulatory woes for the U.K. in Britain continue.

title: Crypto Firm Coinhouse Slashes Workforce 15% Citing 'Reduced Enthusiasm for Web3'
description: Coinhouse's move aligns with a wider trend of Web3 companies laying off staff due to bearish market conditions.

title: Binance stops accepting new UK customers effective today
description:
Cryptocurrency giant Binance will cease accepting new UK users effective at 5:00 PM London time on Monday, October 16, 2023 (16:00 UTC). This move comes in the wake of the UK’s enforcement of the Financial Promotions Regime for qualifying crypto assets that came into effect on October 8, 2023, allowing unregulated overseas firms like Binance […]

The post Binance stops accepting new UK customers effective today appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin Pumps and Dumps on Fake ETF Approval News
description: Rumors of a Bitcoin spot ETF approval caused prices to briefly spike then crash after the claims were rapidly denied.

title: BIGTIME Skyrockets Over 250% With Coinbase and OKX Backing
description:
As trading firms Coinbase and OKX throw their weight behind Big Time’s native token, BIGTIME, the crypto community buzzes excitedly. Hence, within the last 7-days, this under-the-radar gaming token registered a spectacular rise, shooting up nearly 250%. Moreover, its price touched a noteworthy peak of $0.341, showcasing this token’s potential in the decentralized gaming sector. […]
